name: Harlequins QUEST
description:
Prototype of a 2D platformer game of a little harlequin in a dungeon.

>>CONTROLS ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

KEYBOARD OR GAMEPAD:

JUMP - [SPACE]  OR (A)

WALK - ARROW KEYS  OR LEFT STICK

RESART GAME - [R] or (select)

EXIT GAME - [ESC]

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-> TRIPLE JUMP

-> WALLSLIDE

-> WALLJUMP

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Good Luck!
